# round(center:radius:thickness:in:)

**Type Method**

Creates a round tabletop shape with the specified center, radius, and thickness.

## Declaration

```swift
static func round(center: Point3D = .zero, radius: Float, thickness: Float, in unit: UnitLength = .meters) -> TabletopShape
```

## Creating a round or rectangular table

- **rectangular(center:width:height:thickness:in:)**: Creates a rectangular tabletop shape with the specified center and dimensions.

items.description: Creates a rectangular tabletop shape with the specified center and dimensions.
items.name: rectangular(center:width:height:thickness:in:)
